import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import useFetchTasks from "../hooks/useFetchTasks"; import useForm from "../hooks/useForm"; function Tasks({valueFromUpperCard, onChange }) { const { tasks, error } = useFetchTasks(); const { openForm, showForm, formValues, closeForm, handleSubmit, handleInputChange, } = useForm(); console.log(valueFromUpperCard) return (
{error ? (
Error: {error}
) : (

{tasks.map((task, index) => { if (valueFromUpperCard === task.project_name) { return ( ); } return null; })} {/* Add the closing tbody tag */}

{task.task} {task.project_name} {task.start_date} {task.end_date}
)}
); } export default Tasks;
